casebody.data:
IN RE: Tony OXENDINE No. 424P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Tony Oxendine, for Oxendine, Tony.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 30th of November 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Pender County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
